title: amazing view
text: The view from these terrace was just amazing. I enjoyed all, we come just for drink, but even the food around looked delicious... The atmosphere there is just unbelievable... The service was really kind and useful, but for me was winning the view of Prague. Warning if you go there close to sunset you can easily get in love;). I can truly recommend this place

title: Sooo delicious experience
text: The atmosphere was very pleased, the service was very kind and everything there was just really tasty, I will totally come back. This place is for vegetarians people, but there is some option a for vegans too. I can truly recommend this restaurant

title: Tasty experience
text: This place is little bit hide and it is more buffet then restaurant , but everything what we try was just amazing. The taste of everything was just great. The service was very kind. I can recommend even you are not vegan or vegetarian.

title: perfect walk
text: I really enjoyed the walk up for the view and the parks around are so huge. Even during day, but through the night. So I can truly recommend
